article_title: Why 2023 was an uncomfortable year for the West
sentence: Why,  they  asked  me,  do  you  expect  us  to  condemn  Russia  for  killing  civilians  in  Ukraine  when  you  refuse  a  ceasefire  in  Gaza,  where  thousands  of  civilians  are  being  killed?
